item.title: 法官延长波多黎各公用事业破产诉讼中止期
item.description: 监督波多黎各电力公司破产案的法官延长了与该案有关的诉讼的暂停期，因为电力供应商正在与债券持有人就如何减少其债务进行谈判。【原文：The judge overseeing the bankruptcy of Puerto Rico’s electric utility extended a halt on litigation related to the case as the power provider negotiates with bondholders on how to reduce its debts.】

item.title: AMD 预测落空，表明人工智能发展步伐放缓
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc. gave a lackluster revenue forecast for the current period, sparking concern that its artificial intelligence sales are growing more slowly than anticipated.】

item.title: 预测假日广告销售放缓后 Snap 下跌
item.description: Snap Inc. 在预计假日季度销售额低于分析师预期后出现下滑，这表明这家视频和信息公司尽管对广告业务进行了全面改革，但仍在努力与 Meta Platforms Inc. 和 Alphabet Inc.【原文：Snap Inc. declined after projecting sales for the holiday quarter that fell short of analysts’ estimates, a sign the video and messaging company is still struggling to compete with larger peers like Meta Platforms Inc. and Alphabet Inc.’s Google despite an overhaul of its advertising business.】

item.title: Alphabet 因谷歌云增长而销售额超出预期
item.description: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet Inc. 公布的第三季度销售额增幅超过分析师预期，主要得益于其云计算业务的增长。【原文：Google parent Alphabet Inc. reported third-quarter sales that climbed more than analysts expected, helped by the growth of its cloud computing business.】

item.title: Reddit 发出假日季强劲信号，股价飙升
item.description: Reddit Inc. 第三季度销售额超过预期，并预计假日旺季将强劲增长，股价因此大涨超过 16%，创下历史新高，因为这家新近上市的公司在广告技术方面的投资持续见效。【原文：Reddit Inc. shares surged more than 16% after beating sales expectations for the third quarter and projecting a strong holiday season, pushing the stock to an all-time high as the newly public company continues to see its investments in advertising technology pay off.】

item.title: 官员指控印度最高部长授权在加拿大犯罪
item.description: 一位加拿大政府高级官员说，印度内政部长阿米特-沙阿批准了在加拿大各地发生的包括勒索和杀人在内的暴力浪潮。【原文：Indian Home Affairs Minister Amit Shah authorized a wave of violence across Canada that included extortion and homicides, said a senior Canadian government official.】

item.title: 资产支持债务销售额突破 3130 亿美元，刷新金融危机后纪录
item.description: 从汽车贷款到飞机租赁，再到地铁特许经营费，随着银行努力满足新的资本规定，以及保险公司对高收益债务的追捧，以各种形式支持的债务销售创下了金融危机以来的最高水平。【原文：Sales of debt backed by everything from auto loans to airplane leases to Subway franchise fees have hit their highest level since the financial crisis, as banks try to meet new capital rules and insurance companies clamor for higher-yielding debt.】

item.title: 菲利普斯 66 预计将超过其 30 亿美元的资产出售目标
item.description: 美国市值最大的燃料制造商菲利普斯 66 周二告诉投资者，该公司预计资产销售额将超过 30 亿美元的目标，并计划出售更多资产。【原文：Phillips 66, the biggest US fuelmaker by market value, told investors Tuesday it expects to surpass its $3 billion target for asset sales with more dispositions planned.】

item.title: 耶伦称欺诈是银行系统日益严重的巨大问题
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，银行系统中的欺诈行为正在成为一个巨大的问题，美国财政部目前正在利用人工智能来检测和处理这一问题。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said that fraud in the banking system is becoming a huge problem and that her department is now using artificial intellignece to detect and deal with the issue.】

item.title: 巴西雷亚尔因削减开支规模的不确定性而走低
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）拒绝证实政府正在考虑削减开支的数额，称他不知道当地报纸报道的数字从何而来，巴西雷亚尔因此扩大了跌幅。【原文：Brazil’s real extended losses after Finance Minister Fernando Haddad refused to confirm the amount of spending cuts the government is considering, saying he didn’t know where numbers reported by local newspapers had come from.】

item.title: Stability AI 不再由前首席执行官 Emad Mostaque 控制
item.description:
这家初创公司的联合创始人于今年 3 月离职，但直到现在仍是公司的最大股东 — 

。【原文：

The startup’s co-founder left in March but remained the largest shareholder — until now

】

item.title: 施莱格尔称，瑞士联合银行可能需要再次降息
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）表示，随着通胀放缓，瑞士国家银行可能不得不再次降低借贷成本。【原文：The Swiss National Bank may have to lower borrowing costs again as inflation slows, according to President Martin Schlegel.】

item.title: 殖民地管道公司考虑以 100 多亿美元的价值出售资产
item.description: 美国最大的燃料管道系统运营商 Colonial Pipeline Co.【原文：Colonial Pipeline Co., operator of the largest US fuel pipeline system, is weighing options including a sale that could value the company at more than $10 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 摩根大通称 1.8 万亿美元贷款市场的 "恐惧已经消退
item.description: 去年，监管机构曾将信贷市场的一角描述为潜在的 "绿色营销 "温床，但有迹象表明，银行家们一直在打击企业的宣传行为。【原文：In a corner of the credit market that regulators last year characterized as a potential hot-bed of greenwashing, there are signs that bankers have been cracking down on corporate pitches.】

item.title: 高盛、摩根大通交易员竞购泰晤士河公司拟议债务份额
item.description: 由于泰晤士水务公司正努力避免即将出现的流动性紧缩，债权人将在未来数月内向该公司提供新的超级优先债务融资，债务交易商们正急于从中分一杯羹。【原文：Debt traders are rushing to secure a piece of the new, super senior debt facility that creditors are set to offer Thames Water in coming months as the beleaguered utility tries to avoid an imminent liquidity crunch.】

item.title: 欧洲 2024 年首次公开募股为谨慎投资者带来选择性收益
item.description: 欧洲今年的首次公开募股平均取得了积极的成果，少数公司的股价上涨掩盖了投资者对新近上市公司股票的普遍谨慎态度。【原文：Initial public offerings in Europe this year delivered positive results on average, with rising shares for a small number of companies masking widespread caution among investors for recently-listed firms.】

item.title: 迫于欧洲央行压力，Raiffeisen 削减俄罗斯贷款和存款
item.description: 在欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）要求 Raiffeisen Bank International AG 削减其在俄罗斯的风险敞口后，该银行削减了约四分之一的俄罗斯贷款和存款额。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG slashed the volume of its Russian loans and deposits by about a quarter, after the European Central Bank demanded the lender cut its exposure in the country.】

item.title: 选举否认者利用电报召集摇摆州的民调观察者
item.description: 认为唐纳德-特朗普赢得了 2020 年美国大选的阴谋论者正在网上制定计划，监视和拍摄美国摇摆州的投票站，民权组织称这一行动有可能压制选民投票率。【原文：Conspiracy theorists who believe Donald Trump won the 2020 US election are making plans online to monitor and film polling places in US swing states, an effort that civil rights groups say risks suppressing voter turnout.】

item.title: 凯莱赫说，瑞银最终希望收购一家美国财富管理公司
item.description: 瑞银集团董事长科尔姆-凯莱赫（Colm Kelleher）表示，一旦瑞士信贷完成整合，瑞银集团最终将寻求收购另一家美国财富管理公司，以扩大其在美国的业务。【原文：UBS Group AG Chairman Colm Kelleher said that his bank is eventually looking to buy another US wealth management firm to expand its presence there, once the Credit Suisse integration is complete.】

item.title: 老鹰橄榄球队寻求借款 3 亿美元帮助偿还战神公司的债务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，作为全球最活跃的足球俱乐部投资者之一，鹰牌足球控股有限公司（Eagle Football Holdings Ltd. ）正在寻求借贷约 3 亿美元，以帮助偿还 Ares Management Corp. 的部分贷款，作为更广泛的资本结构调整计划的一部分。【原文：Eagle Football Holdings Ltd., one of the most active investors in football clubs globally, is seeking to borrow about $300 million to help repay part of a loan from Ares Management Corp. as part of a broader recapitalization plan, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: PlayStation 关闭《协和》视频游戏失败背后的工作室
item.description: 索尼集团公司的 PlayStation 部门将关闭射击游戏《协和》的开发商 Firewalk Studios。【原文：Sony Group Corp.’s PlayStation unit will shut down Firewalk Studios, developer of the shooter game Concord, which was taken offline two weeks after its release earlier this year.】

item.title: 普雷斯顿-霍洛（Preston Hollow）小额贷款公司正在探索出售事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，普雷斯顿空心社区资本公司（Preston Hollow Community Capital）正在探索包括出售在内的战略选择。【原文：Preston Hollow Community Capital, a municipal finance lender, is exploring strategic options including a sale, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 西门子即将达成收购软件集团 Altair 的交易
item.description: 知情人士透露，西门子公司即将同意收购软件制造商 Altair Engineering Inc.【原文：Siemens AG is close to agreeing to a deal to buy software maker Altair Engineering Inc., people familiar with the matter said, in what would be its largest-ever acquisition.】

item.title: 好莱坞母校哈佛西湖分校选择 Munis 打造新校区
item.description: 哈佛西湖学校（Harvard-Westlake School）是美国最顶级的私立学校之一，因培养了一代又一代的好莱坞明星而闻名于世。【原文：Harvard-Westlake School, one of the country’s most exclusive private schools famous for educating generations of Hollywood stars, is tapping the public debt markets for the first time.】

item.title: 人工智能蓬勃发展，ASM 订单超出预期
item.description: ASM International NV 第三季度的订单超过预期，原因是人工智能热潮推动了对这家荷兰公司先进芯片制造工具的需求。【原文：ASM International NV’s orders beat estimates in the third quarter, as the artificial intelligence boom drives demand for the Dutch firm’s advanced chipmaking tools.】

item.title: 民调显示选情胶着，特朗普媒体支持率高达 330
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司股价延续了连续五周的涨势，为这家公司增加了超过 80 亿美元的价值，有人预计，如果这位前总统在下周的大选中获胜，这家公司将大幅受益。【原文：Shares in Donald Trump’s social media company extended a five-week rally that’s added more than $8 billion in value to a company some expect will benefit sharply if the former president wins next week’s election.】

item.title: 波兰 2024 年预算缺口因税收流入减少和洪水而扩大
item.description: 波兰政府上调了 2024 年的预算赤字，原因是增值税收入低于预期，加上毁灭性洪灾引发的额外支出，使财政计划捉襟见肘。【原文：Poland’s government revised up its 2024 budget deficit as lower than expected value-added tax revenues strain the fiscal plan along with additional spending triggered by a devastating flood.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，马斯克的 xAI 公司正在洽谈 400 亿美元估值事宜
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI 正在洽谈以 400 亿美元的估值进行新一轮融资。【原文：Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI is in talks to raise new funding at a $40 billion valuation, the Wall Street Journal reported, just months after a separate financing for the startup raised $6 billion.】

item.title: 博通因与 OpenAI 合作的报道而上涨
item.description: 据路透社报道，OpenAI 正在与博通公司合作开发一款新的人工智能芯片，博通公司股价上涨达 4%。【原文：Broadcom Inc. shares gained as much as 4% after Reuters reported that OpenAI is working with the company on a new artificial intelligence chip.】

item.title: 摩根大通和贝尔德在大选前热衷于购买小额债券
item.description: 一些投资者急于在大选导致供应减少之前购买市政债券。【原文：Some investors are eager to buy municipal bonds before supply tapers off because of the elections.】
